txt.en: 'I hate to see a high level character struggling to find two golds to rub together. I have an allowance for you, but just like the allowance you got as a kid, this is only a once a week thing, so spend it wisely!'
'Remember, this allowance is only available once a week, so spend it wisely!'
By completing this quest, you will receive a gold allowance.
By completing this quest, you will receive a gold allowance.
